title: Beachfront Getaway with Daily Breakfast and Dining Inclusions
description: Discover the melting pot of cultures and traditions of Penang with a stay at the Mercure Penang Beach, located steps away from a pristine beach and just 20 minutes from the UNESCO World Heritage-listed site of George Town. Soak up uninterrupted sea views from your room and enjoy daily buffet breakfast, a set-menu lunch, 20% discount on food and beverages at the hotel's restaurant and bar and a guaranteed late 2pm checkout.
offer_address: 505, Jalan Tanjung Bungah, 11200 Tanjung Bungah, Pulau Pinang, Malaysia

title: Contemporary Hilton Penang Stay with Daily Breakfast
description:
Escape to the food capital of Malaysia with a stay at DoubleTree Resort by Hilton Penang. Located on the island of Penang, this contemporary hotel places you near the popular UNESCO World Heritage-listed site of George Town. Your city escape includes daily buffet breakfast, one afternoon tea, a welcome cocktail each, welcome cookies, dining and spa discounts and a leisurely 2pm checkout.

**Travelling with family or as a group?** Upgrade to a two-bedroom Family Room, valid for two adults and two children.
offer_address: 56, Jalan Low Yat, Puncak Ria, 11100 Batu Ferringhi, Pulau Pinang, Malaysia

title: Grand Opening: Malaysia’s First DoubleTree Resort
description: Be one of the first to experience Malaysia’s only DoubleTree Resort by Hilton Hotel. Spend five nights and receive a complimentary upgrade to a Deluxe Room, daily buffet breakfasts, a three-course dinner, welcome drink and signature chocolate-chip cookie each on arrival, nightly cocktail each, entry to Teddyville Museum, late checkout and more for two adults.
location_description: DoubleTree Resort by Hilton Penang O L D
offer_address: 56, Jalan Low Yat, Puncak Ria, 11100 Batu Ferringhi, Pulau Pinang, Malaysia

title: Five-Star Beachfront Escape in the Heart of Penang with Daily Dining & Nightly Cocktails
description: Discover Penang's vibrant energy at the contemporary Angsana Teluk Bahang, a five-star, Peranakan-inspired, island escape sprawled along tranquil Teluk Bahang Beach. Take a dip in the infinity pool while little ones splash about in the kids' pool or are entertained at the Kids' Club. Enjoy an invigorating treatment at the award-winning Spa Angsana, be wined and dined in any of the five onsite restaurants and bars or take the 25-minute trip to Gurney Drive, where hawkers and exciting restaurants serve mouthwatering dishes by the sea.
offer_address: 11, Jalan Teluk Bahang, Teluk Bahang, 11050 Penang, Malaysia

title: Experience the Food Capital of Malaysia
description: Escape to the food capital of Malaysia with a stay at the DoubleTree Resort by Hilton Penang. Located on the island of Penang, this contemporary hotel places you near the popular UNESCO World Heritage-listed site of George Town. Included is a daily buffet breakfast for two, Kids Club access for one child, a welcome cocktail each and more. Five and seven-night stays will also enjoy one three-course dinner for two. Plus, one child aged 11 and under stays free with breakfast included!
offer_address: 56, Jalan Low Yat, Puncak Ria, 11100 Batu Ferringhi, Pulau Pinang, Malaysia

title: Top-Rated Penang Boutique Luxury in Heritage-Listed George Town
description:
Relive history in Penang's World heritage-listed George Town with a charming stay at The Edison George Town, Penang. Consistently rated among the area's top hotels on Tripadvisor, this beautifully restored colonial mansion is an architectural gem in the heart of one of Malaysia's most storied cities. Find yourself moments from unmissable cultural attractions, including the stunning indigo-blue facade of Cheong Fatt Tze mansion and the ornate Kek Lok Si temple, both located within a 15-minute walk. Stroll the vibrant streets, keeping your eyes peeled for Penang's famous street art, or escape the heat atop Penang Hill, where the climate is consistently cooler and breathtaking views await.

Boasting an elegant collection of contemporary rooms that embrace the building's historical character, The Edison invites you to discover the enchanting story behind its opulent past while relishing engaging service and modern amenities. Experience timeless elegance in The Lounge, an intimate restaurant complete with a library that invites guests to unwind with epicurean delights. Relax by the gorgeous swimming pool and bask in the rays, taking a leisurely dip or whiling away the day in a stylish private cabana.
offer_address: 15, Lebuh Leith, George Town, 10200 George Town, Pulau Pinang, Malaysia

title: Penang Family-Friendly Shangri-La Escape on Batu Ferringhi Beach
description:
Island paradise meets family fun at Shangri-La Golden Sands, Penang, perfectly situated on Malaysia’s stunning Batu Ferringhi Beach. This beachside resort takes family-friendly to another level - dining, leisure and recreation facilities are plentiful and first-class. Little ones will be amazed by Shangri-La’s wonderful Splash Zone mini waterpark (with three waterslides) and kids' club - open all day - where children eat free. The resort also boasts a gymnasium, a delightful garden, two swimming pools, a whirlpool, five delicious restaurants, a turtle sanctuary, three tennis courts and a nine-hole golf course.

When you're not busy enjoying resort days, head out to vibrant Penang and discover the region’s immense natural beauty. The city’s famous Batu Ferringhi Night Market and the gargantuan Adventure Zone facility are only a few minutes away by foot, or grab a paperback and some sun on Batu Ferringhi Beach's golden sands.

title: Penang JEN by Shangri-La Escape in the Heart of UNESCO World Heritage-Listed George Town
description: Discover Penang's vibrant George Town from JEN Penang Georgetown by Shangri-La, a modern urban oasis in the heart of this culture-rich city, just a stroll from its UNESCO-listed historic centre. For a taste of authentic Penang street food, dine at the onsite Café Jen, or unwind with a cocktail at the sultry Lobby Lounge. When you're feeling active, head to the well-equipped gym and squeeze in a workout, or take a dip in the outdoor pool. Once you're ready to venture out of the hotel, explore George Town's street-art scene, modern cafés and fun bars, all easily accessible on foot from the hotel.

title: Malaysia Oceanfront Five-Star Suite Escape with Daily Breakfast
description: Welcome to Lexis Suites Penang, an upscale seafront haven boasting world-class luxury amid the breathtaking natural beauty of the serene Straits of Malacca. Located just a 10-minute drive from George Town's historic sights, Lexis Suites Penang is surrounded by lush greenery and Teluk Kumbar's charming streets. Enjoy a wealth of indoor and outdoor amenities, including Starz Karaoke, the tranquil LexSpa, Kidz World and the minimalist Japanese restaurant UMI.
offer_address: 28 Jalan Teluk Kumbar, 11920 Bayan Lepas, Penang Island, Malaysia

title: Penang Five-Star Beachfront Luxury with Four Restaurants & Bars
description:
If you've long been searching for beachfront bliss in a secluded paradise, look no further than the five-star Shangri-La Rasa Sayang, a tropical retreat where barefoot luxury is a guarantee. Four exceptional onsite bars and restaurants are the perfect spots to find yourself after long days exploring or lounging on the beach. At Feringgi Bar & Grill, salivate over succulent cuts of meat grilled to perfection alongside other fine-dining delicacies, while the bar serves up ice cold drinks in a cool lounge setting. For the little ones, the Cool Zone Kids' Club will keep them entertained for hours, leaving you to retreat to the tranquillity of CHI Spa for a luxurious full-body massage or invigorating facial.

When you're ready to part from this fabulous hotel, the wonders of Penang await your exploration. Penang National Park, home to silvered leaf monkeys, is just a 15-minute drive away, while the must-see  Blue Mansion is a 30-minute drive from the resort. Much closer to home is the Tropical Spice Garden, a fragrant landscaped oasis that's just a seven-minute drive from the resort.

title: Pristine Penang Oceanfront Oasis with Three Onsite Restaurants
description: Step into an island oasis with a stay at the beautiful PARKROYAL Penang Resort, situated on the pristine Batu Ferringhi Beach. Discover the beauty of seclusion as you wander the palm-covered pathways that weave between the crystal-clear resort pool and the sandy white beach. Spend your days poolside, or venture into the aquamarine ocean to explore vibrant underwater worlds, then finish your day with a cocktail or two at the romantic Sunset Bar.

title: Mainland Penang Stay with Onsite Restaurant & Pool
description: Escape to the tropical paradise of mainland Penang with a stay at the Crowne Plaza Penang Straits City, an IHG Hotel, amply positioned overlooking the azure Straits of Malacca and the bustling city. Explore the vibrant street food scene of Butterworth, or explore the vibrant murals and graffiti art along the Butterworth Art Walk. Back at the hotel, indulge in all day dining at the Lobby Lounge, rejuvenate in the pool, or stretch your muscles at the fitness centre.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Penang Straits City, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 4823-4824 2F, Jalan Pantai, Taman Selat, Penang 12000, Malaysia

title: Tranquil Penang Beachfront Escape with Outdoor Pool & Onsite Restaurant
description:
The tropical charms of Penang are yours to embrace from this stylish sanctuary, perfectly perched along the sandy shores of Penang Island and overlooking the azure waters of the Malacca Strait. Each room features bold-coloured furnishings that flawlessly contrast the stunning views that can be seen from its vast windows. Take a refreshing dip in the hotel's sparkling pool that offers mesmerising sea vistas, sip on epic cocktails at the M Bar or tuck into authentic Malaysian cuisine at The Ombark restaurant. 

When you're not dipping your toes in the powder-soft sands of the beach, venture beyond the hotel and explore George Town, famed for its vibrant street art and colonial architecture, try out water sports at Batu Ferringhi, or take a funicular train ride up Penang Hill to enjoy panoramic island vistas.

title: Malaysia Five-Star Beachfront Escape in the Heart of Penang
description:
Discover Penang's vibrant energy with a stay at the contemporary Angsana Teluk Bahang, a five-star hotel sprawled along idyllic Teluk Bahang Beach.

Managed by Banyan Tree Hotels & Resorts, the property offers a high level of service and fabulous facilities. Take a dip in the tranquil infinity pool while little ones splash about in the kids' pool or are entertained at the Kids' Club. Enjoy an invigorating treatment at the award-winning Spa Angsana, be wined and dined in any of the five onsite restaurants and bars, or take the 25-minute trip to Gurney Drive, where hawkers and exciting restaurants serve up mouthwatering dishes at a night market by the sea. Located in the heart of popular seaside town Teluk Bahang, you're also never far from beach bars, Penang National Park, the Tropical Spice Garden, and family fun at ESCAPE Penang theme park.
offer_address: 11, Jalan Teluk Bahang, Teluk Bahang, 11050 Penang, Malaysia
